Russ mould design the program after studying the relationship between hundreds of crime and where the perpetrator is live in relation to the crimes they commit then the computer assesses distances between the various crime sites and distances from the crime sites to what is really a forty thousand pixel grid covering the area where they will call the hunting area where the crimes have taken place for each one of those forty thousand pixels you'll sign a probability value representing the likelihood that's where the offender lives.
